message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product for sale. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I really appreciate it.  However,  $140 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay at the moment.  I'd be happy to buy it for $130. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $135.
